direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the PubSysKey attribute with similar control flows and conditional checks.
Both methods involve setting attributes on the DocumentType object, though setPubSysKey is more specific to PubSysKey.
Both methods access and check attributes (PubSysKey in setPubSysKey and other attributes in has).

enhanced_by.reason: Initializes the DocumentType object with necessary attributes, setting up the context for setPubSysKey.
updatePubSyskey should be invoked before setPubSysKey to ensure the correct initial state of PubSysKey.
Both methods verify the presence of attributes and can be used to assert the correct state after setPubSysKey.
